Cape San Blas Grocery Shopping & more

Getaway Groceries stocks your Florida Gulf Coast vacation rental so you can start your vacation the minute you arrive. Our Forgotten Coast is a great place to get away from the congestion of other beaches but with paradise comes quite a hike from Cape San Blas and Indian Pass to Port St. Joe and the area’s only grocery stores. We work with the local vacation rental companies and are passionate about providing great customer service

Need a cooler?  We have ’em!  Each 38-qt cooler will be $25 for the length of your stay.  Save room in your car AND your fridge:  keep your beverages on ice!  Just let us know on your order form under additional items!

“We have been using this service on each visit to the Cape for years. There is nothing better than arriving at our vacation spot, after a long day's drive, to find a fully stocked pantry & refrigerator. No need to go out to a restaurant or a store for food on that first... ”

Walter and Cindy
Maryland
